3Maternal and Perinatal Health Outcomes
Introduction 
Saving Mothers, Giving Life (SMGL) is a 5-year 
initiative designed to aggressively reduce deaths 
related to pregnancy and childbirth through 
a coordinated approach that strengthens 
maternal health services in high-mortality 
settings. SMGLâ€™s evidence-based interventions 
are focused primarily on the critical period of
